revision.comment: Notification of altered sources needing review #IABot
revision.text:
{{Talk header}} {{WikiProjectBannerShell|1= {{WikiProject Military history|class=B|b1=y|b2=y|b3=y|b4=y|b5=y|British=y|German=y|ANZSP=y|WWII=y}} {{WikiProject New Zealand|class=B|importance=low}} }}
== CE ==
Did a drive-by tidy of refs etc.[[User:Keith-264|Keith-264]] ([[User talk:Keith-264|talk]]) 21:33, 10 March 2015 (UTC) :Class field altered to C to conform with assessment.[[User:Keith-264|Keith-264]] ([[User talk:Keith-264|talk]]) 21:44, 10 March 2015 (UTC) ::Tidied citations and used sfn's, hope no-one minds. [[User:Keith-264|Keith-264]] ([[User talk:Keith-264|talk]]) 08:54, 11 March 2015 (UTC) :::Great job, thanks. Shire Lord 20:04, 11 March 2015 (UTC) ::At least one bugger's paying attention ;O) [[User:Keith-264|Keith-264]] ([[User talk:Keith-264|talk]]) 21:06, 11 March 2015 (UTC) :::Indeed! Still in the process of expanding the battle but need more sources, in particular 51st division's attack. The problem is rooted in company actions rather than brigade/division. Shire Lord 21:31, 11 March 2015 (UTC) ::B S Barnes is helpful for a worm's eye view.[[User:Keith-264|Keith-264]] ([[User talk:Keith-264|talk]]) 21:32, 11 March 2015 (UTC) :::Will look into it. Thanks. Shire Lord 21:43, 11 March 2015 (UTC)
== External links modified ==
Hello fellow Wikipedians,
I have just added archive links to {{plural:1|one external link|1 external links}} on [[Battle of Wadi Akarit]]. Please take a moment to review [https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?diff=prev&oldid=712385847 my edit]. You may add {{tlx|cbignore}} after the link to keep me from modifying it, if I keep adding bad data, but formatting bugs should be reported instead. Alternatively, you can add {{tlx|nobots|deny{{=}}InternetArchiveBot}} to keep me off the page altogether, but should be used as a last resort. I made the following changes: *Attempted to fix sourcing for http://www.greenhowards.org.uk/bill-cheall/cheall12.htm
When you have finished reviewing my changes, please set the ''checked'' parameter below to '''true''' or '''failed''' to let others know (documentation at {{tlx|Sourcecheck}}).
{{sourcecheck|checked=false}}
Cheers.â€”[[User:Cyberbot II|<sup style="color:green;font-family:Courier">cyberbot II]]<small><sub style="margin-left:-14.9ex;color:green;font-family:Comic Sans MS">[[User talk:Cyberbot II|<span style="color:green">Talk to my owner]]:Online</sub></small> 20:07, 28 March 2016 (UTC)
